evidence.level1: FDA-recognized biomaker predictive of response to an FDA-approved drug in this indication.
evidence.level2A: Standard care biomaker predictive of response to an FDA-approved drug ih this indication*.
evidence.level2B: Standard care biomaker predictive of response to an FDA-approved drug in another indication, but not standard care int the indication.
evidence.level3A: Compelling clinical evidence supports the biomaker as being predictive of response to a drug in this indication.
evidence.level3B: Compelling clinical evidence supports the biomaker as being predictive of response to a drug in another indication.
evidence.level4: Compelling clinical evidence supports the biomaker as being predictive of response to a drug.
evidence.levelR1: Standard care biomaker predictive of resistance to an FDA-approved drug in this indication.
evidence.levelR2: Compelling clinical evidence supports the biomaker as being predictive of resistance to a drug.
